items.title: Sherwin-Williams Declares Dividend of $0.79 per Common Share
items.description: The Board of Directors of The Sherwin-Williams Company (NYSE: SHW) today announced a regular quarterly dividend of $0.79 per common share payable on June 6, 2025, to shareholders of record on May 16, 2025.

items.title: Architectural Coatings Market Set to Hit USD 117.07 Billion by 2032 Amid Surge in Eco-Friendly Innovations and Infrastructure Demand | SNS Insider
items.author: Sns Insider
items.description: The global architectural coatings market is projected to reach USD 117.07 billion by 2032, driven by increased demand for eco-friendly and high-performance coatings, particularly in the residential and commercial sectors.
